 java.util.List<Artifact> ArtifactContainer.transferFrom(ArtifactContainer cont)
          For the given ArtifactContainer cont, this method will return a list of all the Artifacts in b that are: - not in this ArtifactContainer, or - are newer (more recent) than the corresponding Artifact in this ArtifactContainer Basically, this will give a list of all of the Artifacts that should be transferred from cont to this.
